str2: From hos with the directive enclitic of source; from which place or source or cause.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
Complete, entire, perfect, through all time. From pas and telos; full-ended, i.e. Entire.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Always, at all times, ever. From pas and hote; every when, i.e. At all times.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
From en and tugchano; to chance upon, i.e. confer with; by extension to entreat.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
